snippet: Having outgrown its most recent facility, the Fairfield County Concours d'Élégance was canceled for 2012 as organizers sought out a new home.
abstract: Having outgrown its most recent facility, the Fairfield County Concours d'Élégance was canceled for 2012 as organizers sought out a new home.

headline.main: In Fairfield County, a Homeless Concours Seeks Shelter for 2013 and Beyond
